name: lsssssubg

stmt.origin: ssrdv(hs0, c1, cfv(csubg, c0), wcel(c0, clmod))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, cfv(csubg, c0)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csubg, c0))))
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
-| diffsc(hs0, cfv(csubg, c0))
-| diffsw(hs0, wcel(c0, clmod))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ LMod → c1 ⊆(SubGrp ` c0))
⊣ (c0 ∈ LMod →(hs0 ∈ c1 → hs0 ∈(SubGrp ` c0)))
⊣ d(hs0, c1)
⊣ d(hs0,(SubGrp ` c0))
⊣ d(hs0, c0 ∈ LMod)
